summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel discussing the finalization of a motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, specifically the Table of Contents (TOC) and Table of Authorities (TOA). It shows coordination on timing and document preparation ahead of a filing deadline.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: A paralegal from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) sends an initial email requesting the final version of a motion by 11pm so another person (likely a colleague) has time to prepare the TOC and TOA.

events.title: Coordination for Maxwell Motion Finalization
events.description: Email chain shows U.S. Attorney's Office personnel coordinating to finalize a motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, with discussions about timing for completing the Table of Contents and Table of Authorities.

locations: 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza (U.S. Attorney's Office - SDNY)
keyFacts: The email chain is internal correspondence among U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) staff regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The subject is the preparation and finalization of a legal motion, specifically the Table of Contents (TOC) and Table of Authorities (TOA).
A deadline of 11pm on October 18, 2021, is set for receiving the final motion version to allow time for precise TOC/TOA preparation.
The correspondence indicates active legal work and coordination by the prosecution team in the Maxwell case in October 2021.
All specific attorney names are redacted in the text, appearing only as placeholders like '(USANYS)'.
